headline: Prediction: Broadcom Stock Could Surge by 100% in the Next 3 Years
summary: When looking at stocks with some of the strongest upside potential over the next few years, Broadcom (NASDAQ: AVGO) tops the list.  Let's look at why Broadcom's stock could double, or more, over the next three years.  Broadcom operates in two segments: semiconductor solutions and infrastructure software.

headline: Broadcom: A Trillion-Dollar Valuation Will Be Fair
summary: Broadcom is well-equipped to continue aggressively capitalizing on accelerating AI adoption. Click here to read why AVGO stock is a Strong Buy.
